remarks: The atom exchange property.  Proposition 1(i) of [Kalmbach] p. 140.  A version of this theorem was originally proved by Hermann Grassmann in 1862.  ( ~ atexch analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatexch.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsatexch.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsatexch.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatexch.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatexch.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatexch.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lsatexch.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatexch.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. A ) $.
lsatexch.l $e |- ( ph -> Q C_ ( U .(+) R ) ) $.
lsatexch.z $e |- ( ph -> ( U i^i Q ) = { .0. } ) $.
lsatexch $p |- ( ph -> R C_ ( U .(+) Q ) ) $.
